I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract. I'm doing this show in America because I genuinely believe we can find a superstar. Finally, the acts do not have to be solo artists. They can be vocal groups. | Chrysler weighs changes to minivans Chrysler is debating the future of its Dodge Grand Caravan and its Chrysler Town and Country minivans. "We need to completely rethink the minivan," CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday. We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.
